text: Hagi Solomoni'ma kinima mani'nea knafima mago'azama tro'ma hu'nea zamofo agenkea eseteti'ma agafa huno atumpare'ma vu'neana, kasnampa ne' Neteni agenkema krenentaza avontafepine, Silo kumateti kasnampa ne' Ahija agenkene, kasnampa ne' Ido'ma Nebati nemofo Jeroboamu avontafema krentenafi krente'naze.
